title: Is pes even worth it anymore ?
content: The fees have skyrocketed and the placements simply do not keep par . also the 4th suicide in under a year has shocked me pretty bad . Overly strict overly pricy and simply not that good an option this year . that is why I’m not going to the counselling despite a 2K rank let me know if I’m making a mistake

comments.body: Your call Your Take Your wish

Honestly I would rather take the risk and spend the amount in a decent college than take a low tier college and struggle to even find a basic job.

Now coming to fees, Pessat fees is exorbitant, but if you are taking CSE I feels its worth the investment! 

Adding on to that if you are getting the better college than pes for lesser price then please GO FOR IT! 

Placements are down everywhere so it isnt that just PES is affecting..
what other colleges do you have
Depends on your other options

No, if you ask me tbh, the faculty isn't really good here, competition is only getting higher as intake increases each other, which would mean high stress to maintain a certain level, and the fees through PESSAT definitely don't justify what you receive in return, maybe KCET fees is worth it but definitely not PESSAT, forget about management.
It's definitely not worth going to this college.
